Upgraded(address).details: Emitted when the implementation returned by the beacon is changed.

allBuckets().details: Returns an array of all deployed bucket addresses.

createBucket((string,address,address,add.details: Only the MEDIUM_TIMELOCK_ADMIN role can call this function.

params._params: The parameters for creating the bucket.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setDebtTokensFactory(address).details: This function can only be called by the DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE.

params._debtTokensFactory: The address of a new debtTokens factory contract to set.

setPTokensFactory(address).details: This function can only be called by the DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE.

params._pTokensFactory: The address of a new pTokens factory contract to set.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrades the beacon to a new implementation. Emits an {Upgraded} event. Requirements: - msg.sender must be the owner of the contract. - `newImplementation` must be a contract.

createBucket((string,address,address,add.notice: Creates a new Bucket. Deploys bucket, pToken, debtToken contracts.

setDebtTokensFactory(address).notice: Set a new debtTokens factory contract address.

setPTokensFactory(address).notice: Set a new pTokens factory contract address.
